item.title: Master Historian (Level 8)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Apprentice Butcher (Level 2)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Apprentice Butcher (Level 1)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Apprentice Investigator (Level 1)
item.description: Used git blame to annotate a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Apprentice Pilgrim (Level 1)
item.description: Performed a rebase using git rebase --onto.

item.title: Apprentice Merchant (Level 1)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Miller (Level 5)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 340 times with git add -p.

item.title: Product Manager (Level 5)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Master Author (Level 8)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Apprentice Thug (Level 2)
item.description: Forced pushed a branch with git push -f

item.title: Presenter (Level 4)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Apprentice Archivist (Level 2)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Apprentice Seamstress (Level 3)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Apprentice Presenter (Level 3)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Collector (Level 4)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Apprentice Cathedral Architect (Level 2)
item.description: Added a submodule to a repository.

item.title: Apprentice Seamstress (Level 2)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Let there be light
item.description: Commit without a parent.

item.title: Apprentice Architect (Level 2)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Socialite (Level 6)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push
